snippet.title: NO LOVE LOST | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Join our monthly NO LOVE LOST playtests! Request access here! → https://store.steampowered.com/app/1873120/No_Love_Lost/

Blending elements of PvPvE and competitive questing, 'NO LOVE LOST' takes you on an adventure where you’ll dodge perilous dangers, and backstabbing raiders as you battle to bring back the most Nectar. When night falls and the real monsters come out, get back on your extraction ship stat or be left behind to become one with the planet forever!
_____________________________________________
Sign up for the newsletter - https://ratloopgamescanada.com/no-love-lost
Join the Discord Community - https://discord.gg/ratloopcanada
Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1873120/No_Love_Lost

Follow No Love Lost on:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/nolovelostgame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/nolovelostgame
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/nolovelostgame

Follow Ratloop Games Canada on:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/RatloopCanada
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ratloopgamescanada
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ratloopcanada
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/ratloopgamescanada
